description: Defines a data transfer object (DTO) for creating a room, containing a single field 'name' with validation constraints, along with getter and setter methods.

classes.name: CreateRoomRequest
classes.description: A DTO class for encapsulating data needed to create a room, with validation on the 'name' property, and getter/setter methods.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the room.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the name of the room, returns the current object for chaining.
